import React from 'react'; import "./ImagesGallery.css"; import ModalPopup from './ModalPopup'; import { getUploadImages } from '../../controllers/galleryController'; import { isAuthenticated } from '../../controllers/userController'; class ImagesGallery extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { images: [] } } async componentDidMount() { let usreId = isAuthenticated().user._id; let data = await getUploadImages(usreId); let arrImgs1 = []; let arrImgs2 = []; let arrImgs3 = []; let arrImgs4 = []; if(data.images && data.images.length > 4) { for(let i = 0; i < data.images.length; i+=4) { arrImgs1 = [...arrImgs1, data.images[i]]; arrImgs2 = [...arrImgs2, data.images[i+1]]; arrImgs3 = [...arrImgs3, data.images[i+2]]; arrImgs4 = [...arrImgs4, data.images[i+3]]; } } else if(data.images && data.images.length <= 4) { this.setState( {images: data.images} ); } } render() { return (
{/* {message !== "" && } */}
